Name: Adventure Of Thieves
About the game: Platformer Lovers !!! Dare to accept the challenge? Player vs Player addicted? Train your skills in single player and join in PvP arena. Try the experience for this unique platformer game, there are many level in single player to train your skills, beware there are many traps that you never imagined before. PLAYER vs PLAYER (PVP) Try your ability to steal the treasure from other players as much as possible in each different stage, but remember that your treasure also could be stolen by other players, so you have to build your Dungeon as safe as possible, protect with traps, obstacle and many items from store. Donâ€™t forget to keep build your Dungeon so that treasure that you have not stolen by other player. Be the best player in this game by winning the league of thief. Features : * Just drag and drop to build your Dungeon * Many kinds of traps and obstacles that you can choose to strengthen your Dungeon * Steal treasure from another player
